content: free pattern available as video tutorial on my blog https //www sweetsofties com/2023/03/flipper-friends html crochet kit available at https //yarnsea com/en/project/2121/flipper-friends-amigurumi the 3-in-1 flipper friends pattern includes instructions for crocheting a pocket whale narwhal and dolphin all three sea animal patterns are completely no-sew meaning they re all crocheted in one piece this quick and beginner-friendly amigurumi project comes with photo references and a full video tutorial these cute fishy creatures can be made into a keychain or kept as a squishy plush with super bulky blanket yarn or velvet yarn it is great as a last-minute birthday gift christmas or holiday gift or as party favors or craft fair products kids and children alike will adore these marine creatures **materials** * hobbii baby snuggle yarn or honey bunny yarn super bulky weight #6 in desired colors yarn i used https //hobbii mvk co/2g8s4 * 9mm plastic safety eyes x2 * 5mm crochet hook * stuffing * scissors **size** length 4 10 cm **level** ★★☆☆☆ familiar beginner requires familiarity with stitches used below changing colors and attaching yarn **stitches & techniques used us terminology ** fo = fasten_off chain = chain slip_stitch = slip_stitch single_crochet = single_crochet increase = increase insert 2 single_crochet in same st decrease = decrease single_crochet 2 sts together half_double_crochet = half_double_crochet double_crochet = double_crochet blo = back loops only *copyright notice this pattern is © 2023 sweet softies
